text: Carlo Croccolo (9 April 1927 – 12 October 2019) was an Italian actor, director and screenwriter. He appeared in more than 100 movies since 1949. His debut came in the 1949 movie The Firemen of Viggiù. Croccolo died of pneumonia in Naples on 12 October 2019 at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in Italy Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Naples Category:Movie people from Naples
title: Carlo Croccolo
